title: Russian Transfer issues
body:
RiotWulalowe â€“ 12/17/2014
We have temporarily disabled transfers to Russia.

Curious if this is due to the political happening and internet restrictions that Russia have instituted about sharing account info and privacy related things? 

Maybe just server maintenance???

 Also wondering if this will be affecting the potential for a Russian League Worlds team?

Not asking for a binding or finalized statement (understand political booby traps are everywhere) just looking for some speculation.

replies.body: I'm sure it is because of the instability of the Russian ruble.

What was a Ruble? 

oh that thing that not even the EU will recognize as currency?

Sorry Russia
